replies.body: If you think your account has been hacked, the first step would be to reach out to us through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). When you submit that ticket, be sure to stay logged out so that we can properly look over your account!
